content: My country men una well done, So I was just relaxing and surfing on the internet, trying to entertain myself a bit, then I came across this interesting skit by some user on the platform TikTok which really got attention because of the specific message he was actually trying to pass and as I watched it I tried relating what he was actually saying to my immediate environment and it fits so well that I thought I should drop it in the community today and hear your own personal view and take on this. So we all know how the country be, and how boys for the streets dey continue involved themselves into fraud and many scam related stuffs just to make ends means and the funny thing about this is that some of these guys actually aren't really that educated and have found it really hard to do things the right way and, by this I mean actually following the right path to make money and some of the reasons most guys actually get involved in these scam ethics is because they actually deem it very easy which is actually a big fucking lie, but the lifestyle most of these fraudster lives makes fraud business looks so easy which is actually a mirage because nothing is actually ever easy especially when it's comes to making ðŸ’° money. I have some friends who have actually said that doing fraud is actually the easiest way to make an ends, but when they actually tell me what they pass through day and night for this, then I start to think how funny it really is, how we are willing to some extent of a certain desire to actually do  THE WRONG THINGS FOR THE RIGHT REASON Â .I imagine not sleeping all day and night trying to convince someone for them to actually do your biddings for the purpose of trying to scam or learning all the technological stuff about hacking, sending constant fake mail, claiming multiple identities and so many other hard stuff, and of which scammers are of the mentality that it's supposed to be easy and we all know how hard it is to actually learn and dedicate your mind to things you are not familiar with especially when it comes to tech stuffs but for these guys the dedication and committed is really on another level and this really make me wonder how funny the world is and how people are actually willing to the wrong things for the right reasons.Why not just channel all this energy and time and actually follow the right path, because obviously, trying to scam too is actually not easy and if you are caught there is a penalty that follows it, but following the right way holds no sanction and requires the same commitment too.Please, what's your take on this, make we yan small Tori for this issue.

I must say that most guysÂ  venturing into scam is an evidence ofÂ  a failed government.I know of many people who were very promising quite alright, but the condition of the country coupled with pressure from home and many responsibilities prompted them to embrace any faster and available route to making money to relieve too much pressure. Most of these people were pushedÂ  into this by their parents too. I watched a skit on a guy that used his unborn children for ritual cos his mother asked him toÂ  make money through any possible means and spend on her.I am not justifying them scammers, I still believe in struggling and making money rightly. I also know how long it took me to make the little breakthrough I now enjoy in my career. Its not any easy man and it takes a thick skinned individual to persevere until he succeeds.I'll advice scammers to remove their back hat put on a white hat and with the burning desire to succeed, they must enjoy a favorable breakthrough one day. The truth is, you are never advised to share such vital information with friends and family not to talk of someone who is claiming something else that you don't know.Lastly, avoid logging into your WhatsApp on other devices and whenever you do, try to log out immediately you are done especially on desktop computers. What I have also learnt from life experience is to quickly uninstall your WhatsApp application on your device and reinstall again once you notice an unusual activity going on in your WhatsApp. Do not forget to always activate your two factor authentication in the settings of your WhatsApp whenever you got a new phone or if you have never done it before. comments.body: Becoming a scammer shouldn't be an excuse that the government failed to handle her responsibilities, because I know that in a second world country where live is easy because the government has set a standard of living, there are also scammers in such countries. Scammers are everywhere in the world, sometimes these scammers are working for people, who force them to scam people if not they might get killed due to some selfish interest of their Boss. At the end any money that the scammer gets, the Boss gives them little and takes the lion share.In Nigeria, the lack of patience and confidence in themselves that they can make it without scam is a major problem in the country, because people think that life is all about competition. Because Mr A has made money over night without Mr B knowing how he made his money, or because Mr B is jealous of Mr A, this will make Mr B goin into scamming because he wants to buy the new car that Mr A bought with his legitimate funds. Another thing is that our country government and leaders are not encouraging the youth to decease from fraudulent activities because the government and leaders are also scammers.The government display their own scam through corruption, because when public funds is giving to the leaders to use in construction of roads and building of schools and hospital, they syphon these funds and give some percentage to the person that they know will be able to challenge them why the road is not done.Imagine our new president was finally approved by the Supreme court yesterday that all allegations made on him by Atiku Abubakar was fake, when it was clear that Tinubu presented a forged result in the presidential election, and the court ruled it out. Is that not the biggest scam in Nigeria presently, using a forged result to become the number one citizen of the country because he wants to loot the country's funds. These leaders are teaching the youths and the children not to be sincere with things but to continue dwelling in fake lives and lies, all these are attributes of a scammer.
